p: The results of our study showed that dehulling increased crude protein by six percentage units and decreased NDF and ADF (16.0 and 13.7 percentage units, respectively). According to Vecerek et al [ 4], the protein is mainly located in the cotyledons, while the fiber fractions are found in the hull, possibly explaining our results. The dehulling process of lupine seed increased all the essential amino acids in a range of 0.07 to 0.48 percentage units (dry matter basis).
